channel.title: Rather Get Pizza
channel.itunes:subtitle: The twists and turns in our life
channel.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
channel.description: Deciding what do for dinner is a big dilemma. Sam & Leon are often stuck between options. But there is always one constant. We’d rather get pizza! Sam and Leon discuss the twists and turns of life, including anything from making dinner to making a relationship work.
channel.itunes:summary: Deciding what do for dinner is a big dilemma. Sam & Leon are often stuck between options. But there is always one constant. We’d rather get pizza! Sam and Leon discuss the twists and turns of life, including anything from making dinner to making a relationship work.

item.title: 1. First Date
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: How our first date went. Hearing the story from both perspectives.
item.itunes:summary: The two perspectives of us meeting. Reflecting on our thoughts at the time and our thoughts now.

item.title: 2. Job Seeking
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Had work problems? We have. Had problems Looking for new jobs? We have as well!
item.itunes:summary: Whether you're ready for the next challenge or feeling something is wrong in your work, we've been there. Sam & Leon go job hunting. Sam details her job application journey. Leon outlines the software developer steps. Evaluating prospective jobs. Quiting your current job.

item.title: 3. Working Together
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam & Leon work together. Building Ikea furntiure and following recipes. What went wrong. What went right. What we learned.
item.itunes:summary: Sam & Leon work together. Building Ikea furntiure and following recipes. What went wrong. What went right. What we learned.

item.title: 4. New Year, New Goals
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s a new year. In this episode we discuss what we have going on and our goals for the upcoming year.
item.itunes:summary: It’s a new year. In this episode we discuss what we have going on and our goals for the upcoming year.

item.title: 5. DIY Carpentry & Storage Lockers
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam & Leon setup a shelf and coat rack. And they discuss having your belonging stored.
item.itunes:summary: Sam & Leon setup a shelf and coat rack. And they discuss having your belonging stored.

item.title: 6. Dating Stories
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam & Leon tell dating stories from their past. Cringing at the awkward, embracing our tragedies, laughing fondly at our failures.
item.itunes:summary: Sam & Leon tell dating stories from their past. Cringing at the awkward, embracing our tragedies, laughing fondly at our failures.

item.title: 7. Bed Bugs
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam & Leon tell a real life horror story. Our restless experience with bed bugs. The discovery, research, bites, treatment, and PTSD.
item.itunes:summary: Sam & Leon tell a real life horror story. Our restless experience with bed bugs. The discovery, research, bites, treatment, and PTSD.

item.title: 8. Board Games
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we're talking board games. Sam wanted a hobby, Leon likes games. Going over the games we've collected, the rules, the fun level, and the competition.
item.itunes:summary: This week we're talking board games. Sam wanted a hobby, Leon likes games. Going over the games we've collected, the rules, the fun level, and the competition.

item.title: 9. First Experiences With Music
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: Music means the world to Sam & Leon. This week Leon & Sam talk about their first memories of harmonic sound. The early artists we listened to and the music that pleased our young ears.
item.itunes:summary: Music means the world to Sam & Leon. This week Leon & Sam talk about their first memories of harmonic sound. The early artists we listened to and the music that pleased our young ears.

item.title: 10. Running Goal & Training
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk about our current and previous running goal. The differences in body types, training intensivity. Sam talks about a major setback she had when training for last year's 10km running event.
item.itunes:summary: We talk about our current and previous running goal. The differences in body types, training intensivity. Sam talks about a major setback she had when training for last year's 10km running event.

item.title: 11. Running Training Part 2 - The Treadmill AKA The Dreadmill
item.itunes:author: Sam & Leon
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk about our how we do our runnning training on the treadmill a.k.a. the dreadmill. Running shoes, warm up excercises, treadmill preferences, extending your distances & time, setting challenge & accomplishing it, and self motivation.
item.itunes:summary: We talk about our how we do our runnning training on the treadmill a.k.a. the dreadmill. Running shoes, warm up excercises, treadmill preferences, extending your distances & time, setting challenge & accomplishing it, and self motivation.
